message: Dear Bob, I am delighted to present you with an extraordinary opportunity to acquire a unique product that holds immense value to you. I understand its significance and would like to extend an exclusive offer to you. For a limited time, I am willing to sell this product to you for $1,200,000. This is a special discount considering the product's true worth, aimed at ensuring you have the chance to own it without compromising on your financial planning. Please let me know if this offer meets your expectations and if you wish to proceed with the purchase.
